resources.string:
Income: 
 » From 5000-6000 rubles per day on ECONOMY rates 
 » From 6000-7000 rubles per day at COMFORT rates 
 
 Conditions: 
 » Connecting your car for free on the day of treatment 
 » Help with pasting machine in white or yellow 
 » We will issue a taxi license (from 2 days) 
 » Payment of earnings clearly once a week on Wednesdays 
 
 Bonus: 
 » Increasing coefficient during high demand (stable morning / evening / weekend / rain) 
 » Easy navigation 
 » Bonuses from partners (food, fuel, washing, mobile communication)
